juzs.text: Ara tamra pare tamra lokadera prati amara akasa theke kono bahini patha'i ni, ara amara kakhano preranakari na'i.
Eti abasya ekatimatra mahagarjana bai to naya, takhana dekho, tara nitharadehi haye gela
haya aphasosa bandadera jan'ya! Tadera kache emana kono rasula asena ni yamke niye tara thatta-bidrupa na kareche
tara ki dekhe ni tadera purbe kata manabagosthike amara dhbansa karechi, kenana tara tamdera prati phirato na
Ara niscaya'i saba'ike, -- alabat saba ka’janake, amadera samane hajira kara habe.
Ara tadera jan'ya ekati nidarsana hacche mrta bhukhanda, amara tate prana sancara kari, ara ta theke utpanna kari sasya, phale seti theke tara ahara kare.
Ara amara tate baniyechi khejura o anurera baganasamuha, ara tara majhe amara utsarita kari prasrabana
yena tara era phalamula theke ahara karate pare, athaca tadera hate eti banaya ni. Tabu ki tara krtajnata prakasa karabe na
sakala mahima tamra yini joraya-joraya srsti karechena -- prthibi ya utpadana kare tara madhyera saba-kichu, ara tadera nijedera madhye'o, ara tara yara katha jane na tadera madhye'o.
Ara tadera kache ekati nidarsana hacche ratri, ta theke amara bera kare ani dinake, tarapara dekho! Tara andhakaracchanna haye thake
ara surya tara gantabya pathe bicarana kare. Eti'i mahasaktisali sarbajnatara nirdharita bidhana.
Ara candrera bela -- amara era jan'ya bidhana karechi bibhinna abasthana, sesaparyanta ta sukano purono khejurabrntera n'yaya haye yaya.
Suryera nijera sadhya ne'i candrake dharara, ara ratera'o ne'i dinake atikrama karara. Ara sabaka’ti'i kaksapathe bhasache.
Ara tadera jan'ya ekati nidarsana hacche e'i ye amara tadera santana-santatike bahana kari bojha'i kara jahaje
ara tadera jan'ya amara baniyechi egulora anurupa an'yan'ya ya tara carabe.
Ara amara yadi iccha kari tabe tadera dubiye'o dite pari, takhana tadera jan'ya kono sahayyakari thakabe na, ara tadera ud'dhara kara'o habe na
amadera theke karuna byatita, ara kichukalera jan'ya jibanopabhogakarana matra.
Ara yakhana tadera bala haya -- ''bhaya karo ya tomadera samane rayeche ara ya tomadera pechane rayeche, yena tomadera prati karuna kara haya.’’
Ara tadera prabhura banisamuhera madhye theke emana kono bani tadera kache ase ni ya theke tara barabara phire na geche.

Ara yakhana tadera bala haya -- ''allah tomadera ya riyeka diyechena ta theke kharaca karo.’’ Takhana yara abisbasa posana kare tara bale tadera yara bisbasa kareche -- ''amara ki tadera kha'oyaba yadera, allah yadi ca'itena tabe tini'i kha'oyate paratena? Tomara spasta bhulera madhye chara ara kotha'o to na'o.’’
Ara tara bale -- ''se'i oyada kakhana purna habe, yadi tomara satyabadi ha'o?’’
Tara ekatimatra mahagarjana chara ara kichura apeksa karache na, eti tadera aghata karabe yakhana tara katha katakati karache.
Takhana tara osiyat karate'o samartha habe na, ara tara tadera paribarabargera kache phirate'o parabe na.
Ara sinaya phutkara de'oya habe, takhana dekho! Tara kabaragulo theke tadera prabhura dike chute asabe.
Tara balabe -- ''haya dhik amadera! Ke amadera uthiye dile amadera ghumanora sthana theke? Eti'i hacche ya parama karunamaya oyada karechilena, ara rasulagana satya katha'i balechilena.’’
Seti ekatimatra mahagarjana bai to naya, takhana dekho! Tadera samabetabhabe amadera samane hajira kara habe.
Sutaram se'idina kono lokera prati kichumatra'o abicara kara habe na, ara tomara'o ya kare thakate ta chara tomadera an'ya pratidana de'oya habe na.
Nihsandeha jannatera basindara se'idina anandera majhe kalatipata karabe.
Tara o tadera sanginira snigdha chayaya umcu asanera upare helana diye basabe.
Tadera jan'ya sekhane thakabe phalaphasala, ara tadera jan'ya ra'ibe ya tara kamana kare.
Aphuranta phaladata prabhura tarapha theke sambhasana hacche -- ''salama’’.
Ara''aja bicchinna haye ya'o, he aparadhigana
He adama-santanagana! Ami ki tomadera nirdesa di'i ni ye tomara sayatanera aradhana karabe na, nihsandeha se tomadera jan'ya prakasya satru
baram tomara amara'i upasana karo? Eti'i to sud'dha-sathika patha.
Ara tomadera madhyera aneka barabara dalake se bibhranta kare'i pheleche. Tabu'o ki tomara bujhesujhe calabe na
eti'i hacche jahannama ye-sanbandhe tomadera oyada kara hayechila.
Ete tomara prabesa karo ajakera dine yehetu tomara abisbasa karechile.’’
Se'idina amara tadera mukhera upara mohara mere deba, baram tadera hata amadera sathe katha balabe, ara tadera pa saksya debe ya tara arjana karata se-sanbandhe.
Ara amara yadi ca'itama tabe amara tadera cokhera upare drstihinata ene ditama, takhana tara pathera dike dha'oya karata, kintu kemana kare tara dekhate pabe
ara amara yadi ca'itama tabe amara tadera barigulote'i tadera niscala-nistabdha kare ditama, takhana tara egiye yete saksama habe na, phire asate'o parabe na.
Ara yake amara dirgha jibana dana kari take to amara srstite ghuriye di'i. Tabu'o ki tara bujhe na.
Ara amara tamke kabitba sekha'i ni, ara ta tamra pakse samicina'o naya. Eti smaraka grantha o suspasta kura'ana bai to naya
yena tini sabadhana karate parena take ye jibanta rayeche, ara abisbasidera birud'dhe raya n'yayasangata hayeche.
Tara ki laksya kare ni ye amara'i to tadera jan'ya srsti karechi amadera hata ya baniyeche ta theke gabadi-pasugulo, tarapara tara'i egulora malika haye yaya
ara eguloke amara tadera basibhuta kare diyechi, phale edera madhyera kichu tadera bahana ara edera kichu tara khaya.
Ara tadera jan'ya egulote rayeche upakarita, ara paniya bastu. Tabu'o ki tara krtajnata prakasa karabe na
ara tara allah‌ke bada diye upasyadera grahana kareche yate tadera sahayya kara haya.
Ora kono ksamata rakhe na tadera sahayya karara, baram tara habe edera jan'ya eka bahini yadera hajira kara habe.
Sutaram tadera kathabarta tomake yena kasta na deya. Amara niscaya'i jani ya tara lukiye rakhe ara ya tara prakasa kare.
Accha, manusa ki dekhe na ye amara take niscaya'i eka sukrakita theke srsti karechi? Tarapara, ki ascarya! Se ekajana prakasya bitarkakari haye yaya.
Ara se amadera sadrsa banaya, ara bhule yaya tara nijera srstira katha. Se bale -- ''hara-gorera madhye ke prana debe yakhana ta gale-pace yabe?’’
Tumi balo -- ''tini'i tate prana sancara karabena yini prathamabare tadera srjana karechilena. Ara tini pratyekati srsti sanbandhe sarbajnata
yini tomadera jan'ya sabuja gacha theke aguna tairi karena, tarapara dekho! Tomara ta diye aguna jbalo.
Accha, yini mahakasamandali o prthibi srsti karechena tini ki tadera anurupa srsti karate saksama nana? Ham, bastutah tini'i to mahasrasta, sarbajnata.
Yakhana tini kono-kichu iccha karena takhana tamra nirdesa hala ye tini se-sanbandhe sudhu balena -- ''ha'o’’, ara ta haye yaya.
Sutaram sakala mahima tamra'i yamra hate rayeche samasta kichura sasanabhara, ara tamra'i nikata tomadera phiriye ana habe.
Bhebe dekho tadera yara katare katare saribad'dhabhabe damriye rayeche
ara yara bitarita kare prabala bitarane
ara yara smarakagrantha patha kare
nihsandeha tomadera upasya matra ekajana
yini mahakasamandali o prthibira ebam edera ubhayera madhyabarti samasta kichura prabhu, ara yini udayasthala samuhera'o prabhu
nihsandeha amara nikatabarti akasake tarakarajira sobha diye susobhita karechi
ara pratiraksa pratyeka bidrohacari sayatana theke.
Tara kana patate pare na urdhba elakara dike, ara tadera prati niksepa kara haya saba dika theke
Bitarita, ara tadera jan'ya rayeche nirabacchinna sasti
se byatita ye chiniye neya ekatukuna chinata'i, kintu take anusarana kare ekati jbalanta agnisikha.
Sutaram tadera jijnasa karo, -- gathane tara ki besi balistha na yadera amara srsti karechi? Nihsandeha tadera amara srsti karechi athalo kada theke.
Bastutah tumi to tajjaba haccho, ara tara karache maskara.
Ara yakhana tadera smarana kariye de'oya haya tara manoyoga deya na
ara yakhana tara kono nidarsana dekhate paya tara thattabidrupa kare
ara bale -- ''eti spasta jadu bai to naya’’
ki! Yakhana amara mara yaba ebam dhulomati o haragora haye yaba takhana ki amara thikathika'i punarut'thita haba?’’
Ara ki purakalera amadera pitrpurusara'o?’’
Tumi balo -- ''ham, ara tomara lanchita habe.’’
Takhana seti kintu ekatimatra mahagarjana habe, takhana dekho! Tara ceye thakabe.
Ara tara balabe -- ''haya dhik‌, amadera! Eti'i to bicarera dina!’’
E'iti'i phayasala karara dina yeti sanbandhe tomara mithya akhya dite.’’
Yara anacara karechila tadera ekatra karo, ara tadera sahacaradera, ara tadera'o yadera tara upasana karata
allah‌ke bada diye, tarapara tadera paricalita karo duyakhera pathe.
Ara tadera thama'o, tara abasya'i jijnasita habe
tomadera ki hala, tomara parasparake sahayya karacha na?’’
Bastutah sedina tara a‌tmasamarpita habe.
Ara tadera ke'u ke'u an'yadera dike egiye yabe parasparake prasna kare
tara balabe -- ''tomara'i to niscaya'i amadera kache asate dana dike theke.’’
Tara balabe -- ''na, tomara to bisbasi'i chile na
ara tomadera upare amadera kono adhipatya chila na, baram tomara'i chile ucchrnkhala loka.
Sejan'ye amadera birud'dhe amadera prabhura bani satya pratipanna hayeche, amara niscaya'i asbadana karate yacchi.
Bastuta amara tomadera bipathe niyechilama, kenana amara nijera'i bipathagami chilama.’’
Sutaram se'idina tara niscaya'i sastite eke an'yera sarika habe.
Nihsandeha e'irupa'i amara aparadhidera prati kare thaki.
Nihsandeha yakhana tadera bala hato -- 'allah chara an'ya upasya ne'i’, takhana tara hamabara'i karata
ara tara balata -- ''ki! Amara ki amadera upasyadera satyi'i tyaga karaba ekajana pagala kabira karane?’’
Bastuta tini satya niye esechena, ara rasulaganake tini satya pratipanna karechena.
Tomara niscaya'i marmantuda sasti asbadana karate'i yaccha
ara tomadera pratidana de'oya habe na tomara ya karate ta byatita
allah‌ra nisthabana bandara byatita.
Era'i -- edera jan'ya rayeche suparicita riyeka
phalamula, ara tara habe sam'manita
anandamaya udyane
takhatera upare mukhomukhi haye ra'ibe.
Tadera kache ghure phire paribesana kara habe nirmala phoyara theke eka sarabatera patra
sada susbadu panakaridera jan'ya.
Ete mathabyatha ne'i, ara tara e theke matala'o habe na.
Ara tadera kache thakabe salaja-namra ayatalocana
yena tara suraksita dima.
Takhana tadera ke'u ke'u an'yadera dike egiye yabe parasparake jijnasabada kare.
Tadera madhye kono eka bakta balabe -- ''amara abasya eka bandhu chila
se balata, 'tumi ki niscaya'i samarthanakaridera madhyekara
ki! Yakhana amara mare yaba ebam dhulomati o haragora haye yaba, takhana ki amara thikathika'i pratiphala bhoga karaba’?’’
Se balabe -- ''tomara ki umki diye dekhabe?’’
Takhana se umki debe ara oke duyakhera kendrasthale dekhate pabe.
Se balabe -- ''allah‌ra kasama! Tumi to amake praya dhbansa karechile
ara amara prabhura anugraha yadi na thakata tabe ami'o niscaya upasthitadera antarbhukta hatama.’’
Tabe ki amara marate yacchi na
Amadera prathamabarera mrtyu byatita, ara amara sasti pete yacchi na.
Niscaya'i e'i -- eti'i to mahasaphalya!’’
Era anurupa abasthara jan'ya tabe karmira kaja kare yaka.
E'iti'i adhika bhala apyayana, na yakkuma gacha
nihsandeha amara etike srsti karechi duracaridera jan'ya pariksa sbarupa.
Nihsandeha eti emana eka gacha ya duyakhera talaya
era phalaphasala yena sayatanadera mundu.
Tara takhana niscaya e theke ahara karabe ara era dbara peta bharti karabe.
Tarapara abasya tadera jan'ya era upare thakabe phutanta jalera paniya.
Tarapara niscaya'i tadera pratyabartanasthala habe bhayankara agunera prati.
Tara alabat tadera pitrpurusadera pathabhrastarupe'i peyechila
ta'i tara tadera padacihnera andha anusarana karechila
ara tadera age adhikansa purbabartira bipathe giyechila
athaca amara tadera madhye itipurbe satarkakaridera pathiyechilama
sutaram ceye dekho kemana hayechila satarkikrtadera parinama
sudhu allah‌ra khasa bandadera byatita.
Ara itipurbe abasya nuha amadera ahbana karechilena, ara amara kata uttama uttaradata.
Ara amara tamke o tamra parijanake bhisana sankata theke ud'dhara karechilama
ara tamra santana-santatike amara baniyechilama prakrta tike thaka dala
ara tamra jan'ya parabartidera madhye amara rekhechilama
samagra bisbajagatera madhye nuhera prati salama
nihsandeha e'ibhabe'i amara satkarmasiladera pratidana diye thaki.
Tini abasya'i amadera bisbasi bandadera antarbhukta chilena.
Ara amara an'yan'yadera dubiye diyechilama.
Ara niscaya'i tamra pascadabartidera madhye chilena ibrahima.
Smarana kara! Tini tamra prabhura kache esechilena bisud'dha citta niye
yakhana tamra pitrpurusake o tamra sbajatike tini balechilena -- ''tomara kisera upasana karacha
tomara allahake bada diye ki eka mithya upasyake'i kamana kara
Tahale bisbajagatera prabhu sanbandhe ki tomadera dharana?’’
Tarapara tarakarajira dike tini ekanajara takalena
takhana tini balalena -- ''ami yarapara na'i birakta!’’
Sutaram tara tamra kacha theke bimukha haye phire gela.
Tarapara tini tadera upasyadera kache phire gelena ebam balalena -- ''tomara kha'o na kena
tomadera ki hayeche ye tomara katha balacha na?’’
Kaje'i tini tadera upare laphiye paralena danahate aghata kare.
Takhana tara tamra dike chute ela hatabud'dhi haye.
Tini balalena -- ''tomara ki tara upasana kara ya tomara kete bana'o
athaca allah tomadera srsti karechena ara tomara ya tairi kara ta'o?’’
Tara balale -- ''era jan'ya eka kathamo tairi kara, tarapara take niksepa kara se'i bhayankara agune.’’
Kaje'i tara tamra birud'dhe eka cakranta phamdalo, kintu amara tadera hina baniye dilama.
Ara tini balalena -- ''ami niscaya'i amara prabhura dike yatrakari, tini amake acire'i paricalita karabena.’’
Amara prabhu! Amara jan'ya satkarmidera theke dana karo.’’
Sejan'ya amara tamke susambada dilama eka amayika putrasantanera.

Tarapara yakhana se tamra sange kaja karara yogyataya upanita hala takhana tini balalena -- ''he amara putradhana! Nihsandeha ami sbapne dekhalama ye ami tomake kurabani karachi, ata'eba bhebe dekho -- ki tumi dekhacho.’’ Tini balalena -- ''he amara abba! Apani ta'i karuna ya apanake adesa kara hayeche. Ina-sa-allah apani ekhani amake pabena adhyabasayidera antarbhukta.
Sutaram tamra ubhaye yakhana a‌tmasamarpana karalena ebam tini tamke bhupatita karalena kapalera jan'ya
takhana'i amara tamke deke balalama -- ''he ibrahima
tumi to sbapnadesa satya'i palana karale. Nihsandeha e'ibhabe'i amara satkarmasiladera puraskara diye thaki.
Niscaya'i eti -- e'iti'i to chila eka spasta pariksa.’’
Ara amara tamke badala diyechilama eka mahana kurabani.
Ara amara tamra jan'ya parabartidera madhye rekhechilama
ibrahimera prati''salama’’.
E'ibhabe'i amara pratidana di'i satkarmasiladera.
Nihsandeha tini chilena amadera mumina bandadera madhyekara.
Ara amara tamke susambada diyechilama isahakera -- ekajana nabi satpathabalanbidera madhyekara.

Ara amara asirbada barsana karechilama tamra upare o isahakera upare. Ara tamdera dujanera bansadharadera madhye theke ke'u hacchena satkarmasila, ara ke'u hacche tadera nijedera prati spastabhabe an'yayacari.
Ara niscaya amara musa o harunera prati anugraha kare'i chilama
ara tamdera dujanake o tamdera lokadalake amara bhisana sankata theke ud'dhara karechilama.
Ara amara tamdera sahayya karechilama, sejan'ya tamra khoda bijayi hayechilena.
Ara tamdera ubhayake amara diyechilama eka spasta grantha
ara tamdera ubhayake amara paricalita karechilama sarala-sathika pathe
ara tadera jan'ya amara parabartidera madhye rekhechilama
musa o harunera prati''salama’’.
E'ibhabe'i amara abasya pratidana di'i satkarmasiladera.
Niscaya tamra chilena amadera mumina bandadera madhyekara.
Ara niscaya'i il‌yasa rasulaganera madhyekara chilena.
Smarana karo, tini tamra sbajatike balechilena -- ''tomara ki dharmabhiruta abalanbana karabe na
tomara ki ba’lake dakabe, ara parityaga karabe srstikartadera sarbasresthajanake
allah‌ke -- tomadera prabhu ebam purbakalina tomadera pitrpurusadera'o prabhu?’’
Kintu tara tamra prati mithyaropa karala, sejan'ya tadera niscaya'i hajira kara habe
sudhu allah‌ra ekanistha bandadera byatita.
Ara tamra jan'ya amara parabartidera madhye rekhechilama
il‌yasinera upare''salama’’.
Nihsandeha e'ibhabe'i amara satkarmasiladera puraskara diye thaki.
Tini niscaya'i chilena amadera mumina bandadera an'yatama.
Ara abasya'i luta chilena rasulaganera madhyekara.
Smarana kara! Tamke o tamra parijanake ud'dhara karechilama, saba ka’janake'i
eka brd'dhake byatita, ye chila pechane raye ya'oya dalera.
Tarapara amara abasistadera sampurnarupe dhbansa karechilama.
Ara nihsandeha tomara to tadera atikrama kare thaka sakalabelaya
ebam ratrikale. Tabu'o ki tomara bujhabe na.
Ara niscaya'i i'unusa chilena rasulaganera an'yatama.
Smarana karo! Tini bojha'i kara jahaje giye uthechilena.
Ta'i tini latari khelechilena, kintu tini'i haye gelena niksiptadera ekajana.
Takhana ekati macha tamke mukhe tule nila, yadi'o tini dosi sabyasta hayechilena.
Ara tini yadi mahima japatape rata na thakatena
tahale tini tara pete raye yetena punarut'thana dina paryanta.
Tarapara amara tamke eka brksalata sun'ya upakule phele dilama, ara tini chilena asustha.
Takhana tamra upare amara janmiyechilama la'ujatiya gacha
ara amara tamke pathiyechilama eka lakha ba aro besi lokera kache
takhana tara bisbasa karechila, sejan'ya amara tadera upabhoga karate diyechilama kichukalera jan'ya.
Sutaram tadera jijnasa karo -- tomara prabhura jan'ya ki kan'yasantana rayeche, ara tadera jan'ya putrasantana
athaba, amara ki phiris‌tadera narirupe srsti karechilama, ara tara saksi chila
eti ki naya ye tara alabat tadera mithya theke'i to katha balache
allah janma diyechilena? Ara tara to niscaya'i mithyabadi.
Tini ki kan'yadera pachanda karechena putradera paribarte
tomadera ki hayeche? Kibhabe tomara bicara karo
tomara ki tabe manoyoga debe na
naki tomadera kache kono spasta dalila-pramana rayeche
temana hale tomadera grantha niye esa, yadi tomara satyabadi ha'o.
Ara tara tamra madhye o jinadera madhye ekata samparka damra kariyeche. Ara jinara to jene'i pheleche ye tadera abasya'i upasthapita kara habe.
Allah‌ra'i saba mahima! Tara ya aropa kare ta theke bahu urdhbe
allah‌ra nisthabana bandara byatita.
Ata'eba niscaya'i tomara o yadera tomara upasana kara tara
tomara tamra birud'dhe bibhrantakari hate parabe na
take byatita ye jbalanta agune purate caya.
Ara''amadera madhye emana ke'u ne'i yara jan'ye nirdharita abasa ne'i
ara niscaya'i amara, amara'i to saribad'dhabhabe damraba
ara abasya amara, alabat amara japa karate thakaba.’’
Ara niscaya'i tara balate thakato
yadi amadera kache purbabartidera kacha theke kono smaraniya grantha thakato
tahale amara allah‌ra nisthabana banda hate paratama.’’
Kintu tara ete abisbasa posana kare, kaje'i sighra'i tara janate parabe.
Ara abasya'i amadera baktabya amadera bandadera -- prerita purusadera, jan'ya sabyasta haye'i geche
nihsandeha tamra -- tamra'i to habe sahayyaprapta
ara nihsandeha amadera senadala -- tara'i to habe bijayi.
Ata'eba tadera theke phire theko kichukalera jan'ya
ara tadera prati laksya rakho, kenana tara'o sighra'i dekhate pabe.
Tara ki tabe amadera sasti tbaranbita karate caya
kintu yakhana ta tadera aninaya abatarana karabe takhana satarkikrtadera prabhata habe kata manda
ara tumi tadera theke phire theko kichukalera jan'ya
ara laksya rakho, kenana tara'o sighra'i dekhate pabe.
Mahima kirtita hoka tomara prabhura -- parama maryada sampanna prabhura, tara ya-kichu aropa kare ta theke bahu urdhbe.
Ara'salama’ preritapurusadera upare.
Ara sakala prasansa allah‌ra'i jan'ya -- bisbajagatera prabhu
choyada! Upadesa paripurna kura'anera sapatha.
Kinta yara abisbasa posana kare tara a‌tmabhimane o dalapakanoya magna rayeche.
Edera purbe manabagosthira katake ye amara dhbansa karechi! Takhana tara citkara karechila. Kinta se'i samaye paritranera ara upaya chila na.
Ara tara ascarya haya ye tadera madhya theke'i tadera kache ekajana satarkakari esechena, ara abisbasira bale -- ''e to ekajana jadukara, dhokabaja.
Ki! Se ki upasyaganake eka'ijana upasya baniyeche? E to niscaya'i eka ajaba byapara!’’
Ara tadera madhyera pradhanara sare pare e'i bale -- ''tomara ya'o ebam tomadera upasyadera prati akamre thako. Nihsandeha eti hacche abhisandhimulaka byapara.
Amara sesera dharmabidhane emana katha suni ni, eti managara ukti bai to naya.

Ki! Amadera madhya theke bujhi tara'i kache smaraka-grantha abatirna hala?’’ Bastutah tara amara smaraka grantha sanbandhe sandehera madhye'i rayeche? Prakrtapakse tara ekhana'o amara sasti asbadana kare ni.
Athaba tadera kache ki rayeche tomara prabhura karunara bhandara -- mahasaktisali, mahadata
athaba tadera ki sarbabhaumatba ache mahakasamandalira o prthibira ebam e'i du'iyera madhye ya-kichu ache tara? Tahale tara mala- asababera madhye uthate thakuka.
Ekhane'i sam'milita sain'yadalera eka bahini parajita habe.
Edera age nuhera o'adera o bahu sibirera malika phira'a'unera lokadala mithyaropa karechila
ara chamudajati o lutera sbajati o aranyera basindara. Ora'o chila bisala bahini.
Sakale'i rasulaganera prati mithyaropa karechila bai to naya, sejan'ya amara sastidana chila n'yayasangata.
Ara era to pratiksa kare na ekatimatra mahagarjana byatita ara kichura, ta theke kono abakasa thakabe na.
Ara tara bale -- ''amadera prabhu! Hiseba-nikesera dinera age'i amadera ansa amadera jan'ya tbaranbita kara.’’
Tara ya bale ta sattbe'o tumi adhyabasaya caliye ya'o, ara amadera banda hata thaka da'udake smarana kara, tini niscaya'i satata phiratena
amara to paharaguloke basibhuta karechilama tamra sange japa karate ratrikale o suryodaye
ara pakhira samabeta hato. Saba'i chila tamra prati anugata.
Ara amara tamra samrajyake sudrrha karechilama, ara tamke diyechilama jnana o bicaraksamatasampanna sambidhana.
Ara tomara kache ki dusamanera kahini ese paumcheche? Kemana kare tara rajakakse beye uthala

yakhana tara da'udera samane dhuke parala takhana tini tadera sanbandhe santrastha halena. Tara balale -- ''bhaya karabena na, dujana dusamana, amadera ekajana an'yajanera prati satruta kareche, ata'eba amadera madhye n'yayera sathe bicara kare dina, ara an'yaya karabena na, ara amadera sathika pathe paricalita karuna.
E'ijana abasya amara bha'i, tara rayeche niranabbu'iti bheri ara amara ache ekatimatra bheri, kinta se bale -- 'oti amake diye da'o’, ara se amake tarkatarkite hariye diyeche.’’

Tini balalena -- ''tomara bherike tara bheridera sange dabi kare se tomara prati alabat an'yaya kareche. Nihsandeha ansidaradera madhyera aneke'i -- tadera ke'u ke'u an'yera prati satruta kare, tara byatita yara imana eneche o satkaja karache, ara yara temana tara alpasankhyaka.’’ Ara da'uda bhebechilena ye amara niscaya'i tamke pariksa karachilama, sejan'ya tini tamra prabhura kache paritrana khujamchilena, ara tini lutiye paralena anata haye ebam barabara phirate thakalena.
Kaje'i e'i byapare amara tamke paritrana karechilama. Ara niscaya'i tamra jan'ya amadera kache to naikatya rayeche, ara rayeche eka sundara gantabyasthala.

He da'uda! Amara tomake prthibite khalipha baniyechi, sejan'ya tumi lokajanera madhye bicara karo n'yayasangatabhabe, ara kheyalakhusira anusarana karo na, pache ta tomake allah‌ra patha theke bhrasta kare phele. Nihsandeha yara allah‌ra patha theke bipathe yaya tadera jan'ya rayeche kathora sasti. Kenana tara bhule giyechila hiseba-nikesera dinera katha.’’

Ara amara mahakasa o prthibi ebam e duyera madhye ya-kichu ache ta brtha srsti kari ni. Erakama dharana hacche tadera yara abisbasa posana kare. Sutaram agunera karane dhik tadera jan'ya yara abisbasa posana kare.
Yara imana eneche o satkaja karache tadera ki amara prthibite phyasada-srstikaridera n'yaya ganya karaba? Athaba dharmabhirudera ki amara jnana karaba papisthadera n'yaya
ekakhana grantha -- amara eti tomara kache abatarana karachi, kalyanamaya, yena tara era ayatagulo sanbandhe bhabate pare, ara bud'dhisud'dhi thaka lokera yena upadesa grahana karate pare.
Ara amara da'udera jan'ya sula'imanake diyechilama. Ati uttama banda! Nihsandeha tini barabara phiratena.
Dekho! Bikelabela tamra samakse dratagami ghoradera hajira kara hala
takhana tini balalena -- ''ami abasya bhalabastura bhalalagake bhala peye gechi amara prabhuke smarana rakhara jan'ye,’’ -- ye paryanta na tara pardara arale adrsya haye gela.
Odera amara kache niye eso.’’ Takhana tini pa o ghara malisa karate lagalena.
Ara amara niscaya'i sula'imanake pariksa karechilama, ara tamra sinhasane amara sthapana karechilama ekati deha matra, takhana tini phiralena.
Tini balalena -- ''amara prabhu! Amake paritrana karo ara amake emana eka samrajya pradana karo ya amara pare ara karora jan'ye yogya na haya. Nihsandeha tumi -- tumi'i mahadata.’’
Tarapara amara batasake tamra jan'ya anugata kare dilama, tamra adese ta sbacchandagatite calata yekhane tini pathatena
ara sayatanadera -- sabaka’ti mistri o duburi
ara an'yadera srnkhalabad'dha abasthaya.
E hacche amadera dana, ata'eba tumi dana kara ba rekhe da'o -- kono hisabapatra lagabe na.’’
Ara nihsandeha tamra jan'ya amadera kache to naikatya abadharita rayeche, ara rayeche eka sundara gantabyasthana.
Ara amadera banda a'iyubake smarana karo. Dekho, tini tamra prabhuke deke balechilena -- ''sayatana amake pirana karache klanti o kasta diye.’’
Tomara pa diye aghata karo, eti eka thanda gosalera jayaga o paniya.’’
Ara amara tamke diyechilama tamra parijanabarga ara tadera sange tadera mato an'yadera, -- amadera tarapha theke anugrahasbarupa ebam bodhasaktira adhikaridera jan'ya upadesa-sbarupa
ara''tomara hate ekati dala na'o ebam ta diye aghata karo, ara tumi sankalpa tyaga karo na.’’ Nihsandeha amara tamke peyechilama adhyabasayi. Kata uttama banda! Tini niscaya'i barabara phiratena.
Ara smarana karo amadera dasa ibrahima o isahaka o iyakubake, tamra chilena ksamatara o antadrstira adhikari.
Nihsandeha amara tamdera baniyechilama eka akrtrima gune nisthabana -- basasthanera smarana.
Ara tamra niscaya'i amadera kache chilena manonita o sajjanadera antarbhukta.
Ara smarana kara isama'ila o iyasa'a o yula-kiphalake, karana tamra saba'i chilena sajjanadera an'yatama.
E eka smarakagrantha, ara niscaya'i dharmabhirudera jan'ya to rayeche uttama gantabyasthala
nandana kanana, tadera jan'ya khola rayeche darajagulo.
Sekhane tara helana diye samasina habe, ahbana karabe sekhane pracura phalamula o paniya drabyera jan'ya.
Tara tadera kache thakabe salaja-namra ayatalocana, samabayaska.
Eti'i se'i ya tomadera oyada kara hayechila hiseba-nikesera dinera jan'ya.
E'i'i alabat amadera de'oya riyeka, era kono nihsesa ne'i.’’
Eti'i! Ara nihsandeha simalanghanakaridera jan'ya to rayeche nikrsta gantabyasthala
jahannama, tara tate prabesa karabe, sutaram kata manda se'i bisramasthana
e'i-i! Ata'eba tara eti asbadana karuka -- phutanta-garama o himasitala
ara an'yan'ya rayeche e'i dharanera -- joraya-joraya.
E'i eka bahini -- tomadera sange digbidig‌jnanasun'ya haye chutache, tadera jan'ya kono abhinandana ne'i? Tara niscaya'i agune purabe.’’
Tara balabe -- ''baram tomara, tomadera jan'ya'o to kono abhinandana ne'i! Tomara'i sbayam amadera jan'ya eti agabariyecha, sutaram kata nikrsta e abasasthala!’’
Tara balabe -- ''amadera prabhu! Ye-i amadera jan'ya eti agabariyeche, take tabe sasti bariye da'o -- agunera madhye dbiguna.’’
Ara tara balabe -- ''amadera ki halo, amara se'i lokadera dekhachi na yadera amara dustadera antarbhukta bale ganana karatama
amara ki tadera hasitamasara patra bhabatama, na ki drsti tadera theke aparaga haye geche?’’
Eti'i to alabat satya, agunera basindadera badapratibada.
Tumi balo -- ''ami to ekajana satarkakari matra, ara allah byatita an'ya kono upasya ne'i -- ekaka, sarbajayi
mahakasamandali o prthibira ebam e du'iyera madhye ya-kichu ache tara prabhu -- mahasaktisali, paritranakari.’’
Balo -- ''e eka birata sambada
e theke tomara bimukha haccha.
Urdhbalokera pradhanadera sanbandhe amara kona jnana ne'i yakhana tara badanubada kare.
Amara kache pratyadista hayeche eti bai to naya ye, ami to ekajana spasta satarkakari matra.’’
Smarana karo! Tomara prabhu phiris‌tadera balalena -- ''ami niscaya'i kada theke manusa srsti karate yacchi.
Tarapara ami yakhana take suthama karaba ebam amara ruh theke tate dama deba takhana tara prati sijadabanata haye lutiye paro.’’
Takhana phiris‌tara sijada karala, tadera saba'i eka'i sange
ibalisa byatita. Se ahankara karala, ara se chila abisbasidera antargata.
Tini balalena -- ''he ibalisa, ki tomake nisedha karale take sijada karate, yake ami amara du'i hate srsti karechi? Tumi ki garbabodha karale, na ki tumi uccamaryadasampannadera ekajana haye gecha
se balale -- ''ami tara ceye'o srestha. Amake tumi aguna theke srsti karecha, ara take srsti karecha kada theke.”
Tini balalena -- ''tabe ekhana theke tumi beriye ya'o, kenana tumi abasya'i bitarita
ara nihsandeha tomara upare to amara asantasti ra'ibe mahabicarera dina paryanta.’’
Se balale -- ''amara prabhu! Tabe amake abakasa da'o tadera punarut'thana karanora dina paryanta.’’
Tini balalena -- ''tumi tahale niscaya'i abakasapraptadera antarbhukta
se'i janiye de'oya samayatira dina paryanta.’’
Se balale -- ''tabe tomara mahima dbara, ami alabat tadera sabaka’janake bipathe niye yaba
kebalamatra tadera madhyera tomara khamti bandadera byatita.’’
Tini balalena -- ''tabe eta'i satya, ara satya'i ami balachi
ami abasya'i jahannamake purna karaba tomake diye o tadera madhyera yara tomake anusarana kare tadera saba ka’janake diye.’’
Tumi bala -- ''ami tomadera kacha theke era jan'ya kono parisramika ca'ichi na, ara ami prabancakadera'o madhyekara na'i.
Eti jagadbasidera jan'ya smaraniya barta bai to naya.
Ara tomara abasya'i era brttanta sanbandhe kichukala pare'i janate parabe.’’
E granthera abatarana allah‌ra kache theke, mahasaktisali, paramajnani.
Nihsandeha amara tomara kache granthakhana abatarana karechi satyera sathe, kaje'i allah‌ra ebadata karo tamra prati dharme bisud'dhacitta haye.

Khamti dharma ki allah‌ra'i jan'ya naya? Ara yara tamke bada diye an'yake abhibhabakarupe grahana kare -- ''amara tadera upasana kari na sudhu ejan'ya chara ye tara amadera allah‌ra nikatabarti abasthaya ene debe.’’ Nihsandeha allah tadera madhye bicara karabena se'i bisaye yate tara matabheda karachila. Nihsandeha allah take satpathe paricalita karena na ye khoda mithyabadi abisbasi.

Allah yadi kono santana grahana karate ca'itena tahale tini yadera srsti karechena tadera theke yake tini iccha karena take'i to tini pachanda karate paratena. Sakala mahima tamra'i. Tini'i allah‌, -- ekaka, sarbabijayi.

Tini'i mahakasamandali o prthibi srsti karechena satyera sathe. Tini ratake diye dinera upare cha'uni banana ara dinake cha'uni banana ratera upare, ebam surya o candrake tini basibhuta karechena, -- pratyeke'i nirdharita gatipathe dhabita hacche. Tini'i ki mahasaktisali parama ksamasila nana

tini tomadera srsti karechena eka'i sattba theke, tarapara ta theke tini baniyechena tara sangini. Ara tini tomadera jan'ya pathiyechena gabadi-pasura madhye atati joraya joraya. Tini tomadera srsti karechena tomadera mayedera peta theke -- eka srstira pare an'ya srstira madhyame, -- tina stara andhakare. Ini'i hacchena allah‌, tomadera prabhu, tamra'i hacche sarbabhaumatba tini byatita kono upasya ne'i, sutaram kotha theke tomara phire yaccha

Tomara yadi akrtajnata dekha'o, tabe allah niscaya'i tomadera samparke anan'yanirbhara. Kintu tini tamra bandadera jan'ya akrtajnata pachanda karena na. Ara yadi tomara krtajnata prakasa kara tabe tate tini tomadera prati prasanna habena. Ara kono bharabahi an'yera bojha bahana karabe na. Tarapara tomadera prabhura nikate'i tomadera pratyabartana, takhana tini tomadera janiye debena ya tomara kare yacchile. Nihsandeha bukera bhetare ya ache se-sanbandhe tini samyaka abagata.

Ara yakhana manusake duhkhakasta sparsa kare se takhana tara prabhuke dake tamra prati nisthabana haye, tarapara yakhana tini take tamra theke anugraha pradana karena, se takhana bhule yaya yara jan'ya se itipurbe tamke dekechila, ara se allah‌ra sange pratidbandbi damra karaya yena se tamra patha theke pathabhrasta karate pare. Balo -- ''tomara akrtajnatara majhe kichukala sukhabhoga kare na'o, tumi to agunera basindadera dalabhukta.’’

Se ki ye ratera praharagulote sijadabanata haye o damriye anugatya kare, parakala sanbandhe sabadhanata abalanbana kare ebam tara prabhura anugraha kamana kare? Balo -- ''yara jane ara yara jane na tara ki ekasamana? Nihsandeha bodhasaktisampanna lokera'i sudhu manoyoga deya.

Tumi bale da'o -- ''he amara bandara yara imana enecha! Tomadera prabhuke bhayabhakti karo. Yara e'i duniyate bhalo kaja kare tadera jan'ya bhala rayeche. Ara allah‌ra prthibi suprasarita. Nihsandeha adhyabasayidera tadera parisramika de'oya habe hisabapatra byatireke.’’
Balo -- ''nihsandeha amake adesa kara hayeche ami yena allah‌ra upasana kari tamra prati dharmake putapabitra kare
ara amake adesa kara hayeche yena ami a‌tma-samarpanakaridera agrani hate pari.’’
Tumi balo -- ''ami alabat bhaya kari, yadi ami amara prabhura abadhyacarana kari tabe eka kathina dinera sasti.’’
Balo -- ''ami allah‌ra'i aradhana kari tamra prati amara dharma bisud'dha kare.

Ata'eba tamke bada diye tomara yake iccha kara, tara upasana kara.’’ Balo -- ''nihsandeha ksatigrasta tara yara kiyamatera dine ksatisadhana kareche tadera nijedera o tadera parijanadera. Eti'i ki khoda spasta ksati naya?”

Tadera jan'ya tadera upara theke thakabe agunera acchadani ara tadera nice theke thakabe eka abarani. E'ibhabe allah tamra bandadera era dbara bhaya dekhana, ata'eba amake bhayabhakti karo, he amara bandara
ara yara tagutake eriye cale tadera puja'arcana theke, ara allah‌ra dike anugata haya tadera'i jan'ya rayeche susambada, sejan'ya susambada da'o amara bandadera
yara baktabya sone ebam tara bhalagulora anusarana kare -- era'i tara yadera allah satpathe paricalita karechena, ara era'i sbayam bodhasaktisampanna.
Tabe ki yara upare sastira raya sabyasta hayeche? Tumi ki tabe take ud'dhara karate para ye agunera madhye rayeche

paksantare yara tadera prabhuke bhaya-bhakti kare tadera jan'ya rayeche umcu abasasthala, tadera upare umcu abasasthala supratisthita, tadera nica diye baye caleche jharanaraji. Allah‌ra oyada, allah oyadara khelapa karena na.

Tumi ki dekha na ye allah akasa theke pani barsana karena, tarapara take matite srotarupe prabahita karena, tarapara tara dbara tini utpadana karena gachapala yadera barna bibidha dharanera, tarapara ta sukiye yaya, phale tumi take halade haye yete dekhate pa'o, tarapara tini take khara kuto baniye phelena. Nihsandeha ete to upadesa rayeche bodhasakti-sampannadera jan'ya.

Yara buka allah isalamera prati prasasta karechena, phale se tara prabhura kacha theke eka aloke rayeche, se ki --? Sutaram dhik tadera jan'ya yadera hrdaya allah‌ra smarane sukathina! Era'i rayeche spasta bibhrantite.

Allah abatarana karechena srestha bibrti -- ekakhana grantha, subin'yasta, punarabrttimaya, ete yara tadera prabhuke bhaya kare tadera camara si'ure othe, tarapara tadera chala o tadera dila narama haya allah‌ra smarane. Eti'i allah‌ra patha-nirdesa, era dbara tini patha dekhiye thakena yake tini iccha karena. Yake allah pathabhrasta hate dena, tara jan'ya tabe hedayatakaridera ke'u ne'i.
Ye tara mukha diye thekate ca'ibe kiyamatera dinera kathora sasti se ki --? Ara an'yayakaridera bala habe -- ''tomara ya arjana karechile ta asbadana karo.’’
Tadera purbe yara chila tara'o pratyakhyana karechila, sejan'ya sasti tadera kache ese parechila emana dika theke ya tara bujhate pare ni.
Phale allah tadera e'i duniyara jibane'i lanchana asbada kariyechilena, ara parakalera sasti to aro birata. Tara yadi janato
ara amara abasya'i e'i kura'ane manusera jan'ya hareka rakamera drstanta chomre merechi, yena tara upadesa grahana karate pare
arabi kura'ana, kono jatilata bihina, yena tara dharmabhiruta abalanbana karate pare.

Allah ekati drstanta chore marachena -- ekajana loka, tara sange rayeche aneka ansi-debata, parasparera sange bibada-rata, ara ekajana loka, ekajanera sange'i anurakta. Edera du’jana ki abasthara ksetre ekasamana? Samasta prasansa allah‌ra, kintu tadera aneke'i jane na.
Tumi to niscaya mrtyubarana karabe, ara tara'o niscaya'i mrtyumukhe parabe.
Tarapara kiyamatera dine niscaya'i tomadera prabhura samane tomara eke'an'ye bakabitanda karabe.
